title: Error locking in champions, summoners spells, and mastery pages.
body: There has been instances where I've been unable to lock in a champion or change my masteries. Is this client side or server?

replies.body: This could be a connection issue causing you to lose sync and not receive your adjustments.  If this is still happening for you, your best bet is to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tighten things up.  It may also be useful to try [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to rule out any possibilities with high stress on your client.
